message: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Cultural, IIT Kharagpur's photo. Hi all . The "OPEN IIT SKETCHING" event which was cancelled on 28th august is being re-held on 4th SEPTEMBER ,from 2pm-5PM @ S302 . Contact your hall GSEC-SOCULT for the clear idea about the rules of the event :) PS: find the rules here in this link https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QYejkD_SuvNA1x5ym6F-FdCyh-w6WXQQq5B4odPqKdg/edit?usp=sharing

message:
Rekhi Centre of Excellence for the Science of Happiness & Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur present to you the Science of Happiness Challenge on the occasion of the 1st International Workshop on the Science of Happiness, to be held on 24th and 25th of September on campus.

Visit http://sandhi-iitkgp.org/happiness for more details on the exciting competitions coming your way, with prizes and grants worth over INR 1 lakh!!

Azad hall brings you the biggest treasure hunt adventure KHOJ.
Collect all the clues spanning the whole campus by solving mind boggling poke riddles to win exciting goodies, T-shirts and much more. Also get a chance to revisit your childhood through poke-events.

Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Net Impact IIT Kharagpur's photo. Net Impact in association with Career Development Centre (CDC) is conducting a Workshop on Higher studies in the USA (MS/PhD programs) with Educidate Founder Mentor Samudranil Chatterjee including a Seminar followed by a unique One to One Mentoring session. Date: 4th Sep 2016, Sunday Venue : V2 Time: 10:30 AM Register: http://tinyurl.com/ni-workshop

The English Academy of St. Xavier's College, Kolkata presents their annual lit-fest Literaria 2016. The following are online events : 
1. Meme'sis (the meme making competition)
2. Striptacular (comic-strip creations)
3. Doodlebug (the doodle competition for the free-flowing, felt-tip pen happy)
4. Lens and Lensibility (the photography competition, but we appreciate Austen too)
5. Dress the Digest (calling all graphics geeks to show off their magazine designs)
6. Jump Cut (a film making project and competition for all the cinephiles out there)

So, sign up for the event which you feel is the perfect fit by shooting an email (with your name, department and college, and the event you want to participate  in) at literaria16@gmail.com
Registrations: 17th August to 5th September.

Get literary, literally.

The English Academy of St. Xavier's College, Kolkata presents their annual lit-fest Literaria 2016. The following are online events : 
1. Meme'sis (the meme making competition)
2. Striptacular (comic-strip creations)
3. Doodlebug (the doodle competition for the free-flowing, felt-tip pen happy)
4. Lens and Lensibility (the photography competition, but we appreciate Austen too)
5. Dress the Digest (calling all graphics geeks to show off their magazine designs)

So, sign up for the event which you feel is the perfect fit by shooting an email (with your name, department and college, and the event you want to participate  in) at literaria16@gmail.com

Open IIT Product Design:
Presentation Date: 6th September, 6:30 pm onwards

The judging criteria and other details will be conveyed to General Secretaries Technology of Halls of Residence by Tuesday(30/8/16). In case of any query, contact them.

Teams must register by 2nd August, 6 pm on:
http://bit.ly/2bINAeY

Any registration beyond this won't be accepted!

Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared International Relations Cell, IIT Kharagpur's photo. Foreign Training and Research Talk presented to you by the International Relations Cell, IIT Kharagpur for all those aspirants who dream to work abroad in a University on a Project next Summer, this is something you surely aren't missing. We have invited students from the 3rd and 4th Year who interned in various Prestigious Universities to share their experiences and valuable insights about the Foreign Training Process, also to calm your jitters and shackle the myths if any. Sunday, 28th August, 5pm at V4...Be there!! :)

Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur's photo. Ahoy Freshers! The time has come to witness the grandeur of yet another facet of the technosapien cosmos. So, hop on, sit back and construe as we delve deeper into this exhilarating spirit of Asia's largest techno-management fest. Be there at Kalidas Auditorium on 25th August (Thursday) at 8 PM. Surprises await you!
